mainText:
I have never owned an Apple product but I will miss Steve Jobs. He forever
changed the media universe and has had impacts on businesses across the
world. It would be an understatement to say that the world as we know it
wouldn't have been the same without him. I can't imagine what it would be
like to walk down the street and not come across someone using an iPod. The
world has lost a great person.
author: Corey
